item.description:
Next month's meeting is called WHEN CENTRAL BANKS RULE THE WORLD. There is no specific book as we have read several already that point to this topic. We will watch video clips again and discuss what we can do to protect ourselves in the event of a dollar collapse and / or the shift towards a global central bank and what that means for the "normal person" on the street.

Please watch this lecture by Joan Veon to get up to speed on the topic. Regardless of how you feel about her quoting the bible in her closing statements in the last segment, pay attention to the time lines and information she is presenting.

Delicious Organic Snacks will be served.
Please Join Us and BRING A FRIEND!
all are welcome.

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: WHEN CENTRAL BANKS RULE THE WORLD
